For our smaller pals, bath time is a featherlight frolic. Picture warm water cascading over their fur, paired with gentle shampoos that make their coat gleam. This is a spa-like experience designed to keep them relaxed and content.

40-80 lbs

The midsize splash retreat is perfect for your canine companions in the 40-80 lbs range. Imagine a soothing blend of water and a mild, calming shampoo. This bath experience is not just about cleanliness but also about fostering a sense of tranquility and calmness.

80+ lbs

$65

Our majestic soak is tailor-made for the gentle giants weighing 80 pounds and above. With spacious bathing areas and specialized products for larger breeds, this experience ensures they feel pampered and at ease. It's more than a bath; it's a royal retreat for your magnificent furry friend.

Grooming

Face, Feet, and Fanny Trims

1-40 lbs

$65

For our smaller furry friends, this trim is all about precision and pampering. We delicately sculpt those facial fur lines, tidy up the feet fluff, and give the fanny a sleek finish. It's a mini-makeover that leaves your little buddy looking dapper and feeling light on their paws!

40-80 lbs

$75

Medium-sized marvels, this one's for you! We'll expertly shape the facial fuzz, trim the tootsie tufts, and refine that fanny fluff. It's a regal makeover that strikes the perfect balance between chic and charming. Your midsize buddy will strut away with newfound confidence!

80+ lbs

$85

For our larger four-legged companions, we go big on the glam! This luxurious trim involves skillfully defining the facial features, tidying up those sizable paws, and giving the fanny fluff a majestic touch. It's a grooming extravaganza fit for royalty. Your grand-sized pup will leave feeling like the king or queen of the canine world!

Grooming

Full Body Grooms

1-40 lbs

$85

For our smaller companions weighing between 1 and 40 pounds, we offer a meticulous full groom cut designed to enhance their comfort and style. This includes a gentle bath using premium, pet-friendly products, careful drying to avoid stress, and a trim that suits both their breed standards and your preferences. Our goal is to keep them looking and feeling fantastic, all while ensuring a relaxed and positive experience.

40-80 lbs

$95

Larger canine friends weighing between 40 and 80 pounds deserve the same level of care and attention. Our full groom cut for this category involves a thorough cleaning, including ear care, nail trimming, and a professional cut that complements their unique features. We understand the importance of maintaining their coat health, and our approach focuses on achieving a polished look while emphasizing relaxation techniques to make the grooming session an enjoyable one.

80+ lbs

$105

For our big and lovable companions tipping the scales At 80 pounds and above, our full groom cut is a comprehensive service aimed at ensuring their comfort and happiness. This includes a deluxe bath, meticulous drying, and a carefully tailored cut that suits their size and breed characteristics. Our experienced team incorporates relaxation techniques throughout the grooming process to create a positive and stress-free environment, ensuring your large buddy leaves looking and feeling fantastic. At our grooming salon, we prioritize not only the aesthetics but also the well-being of your cherished pets. Each session is a personalized experience, and we look forward to pampering your furry friends with the care they deserve!
